statements: SELECT * FROM competition_schedule WHERE competition_id = 1;
SELECT competition_name, location FROM competition_schedule WHERE competition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT competition_name, starting_time FROM competition_schedule WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT competition_name, location, starting_time FROM competition_schedule ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM competition_schedule WHERE competition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT competition_name, location, competition_date FROM competition_schedule WHERE starting_time > '10:00:00' ORDER BY competition_date DESC
SELECT * FROM competition_schedule WHERE competition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT competition_name, location FROM competition_schedule WHERE competition_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY starting_time ASC
SELECT competition_name, location, starting_time FROM competition_schedule WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY competition_name ASC
SELECT competition_id, competition_name FROM competition_schedule WHERE starting_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY competition_id
SELECT competition_id, competition_name, start_date, end_date FROM competition_schedule WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT team_name, result, rank FROM competition_results WHERE rank <= 3 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT * FROM competition_schedule WHERE end_date < '2024-06-01';
SELECT competition_id, competition_name FROM competition_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, result FROM competition_results WHERE result = 'Win';
SELECT * FROM competition_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT competition_name, start_date, end_date FROM competition_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT competition_name, team_name, result FROM competition_schedule INNER JOIN competition_results ON competition_schedule.competition_id = competition_results.competition_id WHERE rank = 1;
SELECT competition_name, result FROM competition_schedule LEFT JOIN competition_results ON competition_schedule.competition_id = competition_results.competition_id WHERE team_name = 'Team A';

SELECT competition_name, result, rank FROM competition_schedule INNER JOIN competition_results ON competition_schedule.competition_id = competition_results.competition_id WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND rank < 4 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT * FROM competition_schedule;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM competition_schedule;
SELECT team_name, points_scored FROM competition_results WHERE winning_team = true;
SELECT * FROM competition_schedule WHERE competition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, current_rank FROM team_rankings ORDER BY current_rank DESC;
SELECT * FROM competition_schedule ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM competition_schedule WHERE competition_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, points_scored FROM competition_results WHERE winning_team = TRUE ORDER BY points_scored DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_rankings WHERE current_rank BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT cr.team_name, cr.points_scored, tr.current_rank FROM competition_results cr JOIN team_rankings tr ON cr.team_name = tr.team_name ORDER BY tr.current_rank ASC, cr.points_scored DESC;
SELECT * FROM sports_competitions;
SELECT competition_name, start_date, end_date FROM sports_competitions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, score FROM competition_results WHERE score > 50;
SELECT team_name, rank FROM team_rankings WHERE rank < 3 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT team_name, performance_metric FROM performance_trends WHERE trend_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM sports_competitions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY competition_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, score FROM competition_results WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT team_name, rank FROM team_rankings WHERE rank > 5 AND rank_date = '2022-06-15' ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT competition_name, start_date, end_date FROM sports_competitions WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, performance_metric FROM performance_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY performance_metric DESC, trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_rankings ORDER BY rank DESC, points ASC;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 10 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT team_name, score FROM competition_results WHERE result_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM competition_schedule WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT team_name, performance_rating FROM performance_analysis WHERE performance_rating > 8 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM competition_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name
SELECT team_name, score FROM competition_results WHERE score > 50
SELECT team_name, rank, points FROM team_rankings WHERE rank <= 3 ORDER BY points DESC
SELECT team_name, performance_rating FROM performance_analysis WHERE performance_rating > 8.0
SELECT player_id, team_name, games_played, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats
